00010 int hexToInt(string hexString) {
00011         unsigned int x;   
00012         stringstream ss(stringstream::in | stringstream::out);
00013         ss << std::hex << hexString;
00014         ss >> x;
00015         return x;
00016 }
00017 
00018 string escapeString(string c) {
00019         string c2 = "";
00020         for(int i = 0; i < c.length(); ++i) {
00021                 if(c[i] == '\\') {
00022                         if(c[i + 1] == 'a') c2 += '\a';
00023                         else if(c[i + 1] == 'b') c2 += '\b';
00024                         else if(c[i + 1] == 'f') c2 += '\f';
00025                         else if(c[i + 1] == 'n') c2 += '\n';
00026                         else if(c[i + 1] == 'r') c2 += '\r';
00027                         else if(c[i + 1] == 't') c2 += '\t';
00028                         else if(c[i + 1] == '\\') c2 += '\\';
00029                         else if(c[i + 1] == '\'') c2 += '\'';
00030                         else if(c[i + 1] == '"') c2 += '"';
00031                         else if(c[i + 1] == 'x') {
00032                                 c2 += (char) hexToInt(c.substr(i + 2, 2));
00033                                 i += 2;
00034                         }
00035                         ++i;
00036                 } else c2 += c[i];
00037         }
00038         return c2;
00039 }
